title: THE HAUNTING OF BLY MANOR Ending & Ghosts Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
👻🎃 The Haunting of Hill House > The Haunting of Bly Manor. Don't @ Me. 🎃👻Bly was still good though.
Check out my other horror breakdowns here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5F8ngoG5WjA&list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7i5oOjx21bz-hnkmbeCmU4j&index=2&ab_channel=ThinkStory
Dani was terrified of seeing her ex fiance's reflection and Jamie waited her whole life wishing to see Dani's reflection. This story was so beautifully written 😭
The fact that Dani sacrificed her life for the kids, but none of them remember her as they grow up makes my heart ache.
I think the most shocking part was finding out Hanna had died literal seconds before Flora and Dani walk up to the well
I still can't believe that she told a 9 hour long story on a wedding eve tho. lmao
description:
We explain the ending, ghosts, and much more in Mike Flanagan's latest tv series for Netflix "The Haunting of Bly Manor.
